io.name: SCISCTCN0013602_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SCISCTCN0013602_inbound" /> <complexType name="SCISCTCN0013602_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="cdNm"> <annotation> <documentation>코드명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="메타시스템 내에 생성되어 있는 STD_AREA_ID 명" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="200" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
